column5: English
column11: English

column5: Are you ready?
column11: Are you ready?

column4: チェンジ！　ゼスターＡ！
column5: Transform! Zester-A!
column11: Zester-A, transform!

column4: ゼスターＡ！　アクション！
column5: Zester-A! Action!
column11: Zester-A! Action!

column5: W-what's that!?
column11: W-what's that!?

column4:
電磁の力で動くスーパーメカだ。
ゼストマシンからゼスターＡへ
と変形する。
column5: It's a super mecha that moves via electromagnetism. It transforms from a Zest machine into Zester-A.
column11: It's a super mech that moves via the power of electromagnetics. It transforms from a Zester machine into Zester-A.

column4:
だが、いまだゼスターＡは
未完成。
column5: But as of yet, the Zester-A is still unfinished.
column11: However, the Zester-A is still unfinished as of yet.

column4:
完成させるためには、
実戦データが必要だ。
column5: In order to call it complete, I need to get some combat data from it.
column11: In order to call it complete, I need to get some combat data from it.

column4:
そこでだ。
君たち、ゼスターＡと
戦ってくれないか？
column5: Which is where you come in. Won't you try fighting the Zester-A?
column11: Which is where you come in. Won't you try fighting the Zester-A?

column5: ...Well, that should be fine.
column11: ...Well, that should be fine.

column5: You're really helping me out here.
column11: You saved me.

column4:
実戦のデータさえあれば、
ゼスターＡに最後の調整を
ほどこすことができるんだ。
column5: If I've got some data, I can make final adjustments to the Zester-A.
column11: If I've got some data, I can make final adjustments to the Zester-A.

column4:
/p、あんまり
強そうな人形じゃないけど、
協力しようぜ。
column5: It doesn't seem like one of the strongest Puppets, but let's humor him anyway, /p.
column11: /p, it's not one of the strongest mechs, but let's cooperate anyway.

column5: Just this once.
column11: Just this once.

column4: ちょうどいいところに来た。
column5: You couldn't have come at a better time.
column11: You couldn't have come at a better time.

column4:
君たち、円工房に
出入りしているらしいね。
column5: I heard that you went to visit the Circle Workshop.
column11: I heard that you went to visit the Circle Workshop.

column4:
なら、事情は飲み込めて
いるはず。
column5: Then you should already understand the situation.
column11: Then, you should already understand the situation.

column4:
師匠が、私に挑戦状を
叩きつけてきた。
column5: My master has thrown down the gauntlet at me.
column11: My master has thrown down the gauntlet at me.

column4:
どうやら
新作を完成させたらしい。
column5: It seems he's completed his latest work.
column11: It seems his latest work has been completed.

column4:
私に挑戦してくるとは、
よほどの自信作とみえる。
column5: Since he's challenging me, he must be very confident in it.
column11: Since he's challenging me, he must be very confident in it.

column4:
師匠は、どうしても
私を叩き潰したいらしいな。
column5: Looks like he's hoping to crush me, no matter the cost.
column11: Looks like he's hoping to crush me, no matter the cost.

column4:
だが
私は負けるわけにはいかない。
column5: But I can't afford to lose.
column11: But I can't afford to lose.

column4:
こんなこともあろうかと、
新しい人形を開発しておいた。
column5: I've developed a new Puppet that might just change everything.
column11: I've developed a new mech that might just change everything.

column4:
みてくれ。これが
/c5超電磁人形ゼスターＡ/c3（エース）
だ！
column5:
Take a gander.
This is the /c5Super-Electromagnetic Puppet Zester-A (Ace)/c3!
column11:
Take a gander.
This is the /c5Super-Electromagnetic Puppet Zester-A (Ace)/c3!
